Static web generation

from the moment I start to blog github, I noticed static web generation could be something good in future. actually after diving into it a while, this is not any new technology. from 2013 there have been people talking using jekyll, and today I find more alternatives, like webgen, and even place like staticgen collect almost all types of static generation available in the market.

most of them rubys, fine.
